info.title: Waktu Solat API Documentation
info.description: The Malaysia Waktu Solat API provides accurate prayer times (waktu solat) for various locations in Malaysia. It offers information on monthly prayer timings, zone detection based on coordinates and more.

tags.name: JADUAL SOLAT
tags.description: Download monthly prayer timetable​ in PDF.

tags.name: SOLAT V1
tags.description:
Return prayer time response similar to the JAKIM's structure. Suitable for drop in replacement
from JAKIM's API.

*Note: The values for 'bearing' and 'lang' are empty (`""`).*

tags.name: SOLAT V2
tags.description: Get prayer times data for a given zone. Updated endpoint.

tags.name: ZONES
tags.description: Get prayer time Zones & Location information.

get.summary: Download monthly prayer timetable​ in PDF.
get.description: Return the prayer times in a specific month for a given zone.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year. Defaults to current year.

schema.description: The year. Defaults to current year.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month number. 1 => January, 2 => February etc. Defaults to current month.

schema.description: The month number. 1 => January, 2 => February etc. Defaults to current month.

example.message: No data found for zone: XXXXX for MMM/YYYY

message.example: No data found for zone: XXXXX for MMM/YYYY

parameters.name: zone
parameters.description: The JAKIM zone code. See all zones using `/api/zones` endpoint.

parameters.description: The JAKIM zone code. See all zones using `/api/zones` endpoint.

get.description: Return the prayer times in a specific month with automatic zone detection based on GPS coordinates.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year. Defaults to current year.

schema.description: The year. Defaults to current year.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month number. 1 => January, 2 => February etc. Defaults to current month.

schema.description: The month number. 1 => January, 2 => February etc. Defaults to current month.

example.message: No data found for zone: XXXXX for MMM/YYYY

message.example: No data found for zone: XXXXX for MMM/YYYY

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude coordinate.

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: The longitude coordinate.

get.description: Return all zones information based on JAKIM Zones. See zones visually at https://peta.waktusolat.app/

example.daerah: Johor Bahru, Kota Tinggi, Mersing, Kulai

Kota Setar, Kubang Pasu, Pokok Sena (Daerah Kecil)

Gua Musang (Daerah Galas Dan Bertam), Jeli, Jajahan Kecil Lojing

Genting Sempah, Janda Baik, Bukit Tinggi
Cameron Highlands, Genting Higlands, Bukit Fraser
Zon Khas Daerah Rompin, (Mukim Rompin, Mukim Endau, Mukim Pontian)
Kuala Kangsar, Sg. Siput , Ipoh, Batu Gajah, Kampar
Kg Gajah, Teluk Intan, Bagan Datuk, Seri Iskandar, Beruas, Parit, Lumut, Sitiawan, Pulau Pangkor
Selama, Taiping, Bagan Serai, Parit Buntar
Bahagian Sandakan (Timur), Bukit Garam, Semawang, Temanggong, Tambisan, Bandar Sandakan, Sukau
Beluran, Telupid, Pinangah, Terusan, Kuamut, Bahagian Sandakan (Barat)
Lahad Datu, Silabukan, Kunak, Sahabat, Semporna, Tungku, Bahagian Tawau (Timur)
Bandar Tawau, Balong, Merotai, Kalabakan, Bahagian Tawau (Barat)
Kudat, Kota Marudu, Pitas, Pulau Banggi, Bahagian Kudat
Kota Kinabalu, Ranau, Kota Belud, Tuaran, Penampang, Papar, Putatan, Bahagian Pantai Barat
Pensiangan, Keningau, Tambunan, Nabawan, Bahagian Pendalaman (Atas)
Beaufort, Kuala Penyu, Sipitang, Tenom, Long Pasia, Membakut, Weston, Bahagian Pendalaman (Bawah)
Pandan, Belaga, Suai, Tatau, Sebauh, Bintulu
Sibu, Mukah, Dalat, Song, Igan, Oya, Balingian, Kanowit, Kapit
Sarikei, Matu, Julau, Rajang, Daro, Bintangor, Belawai
Lubok Antu, Sri Aman, Roban, Debak, Kabong, Lingga, Engkelili, Betong, Spaoh, Pusa, Saratok
Gombak, Petaling, Sepang, Hulu Langat, Hulu Selangor, Shah Alam

get.summary: All Zones for the given state
get.description: Return all zones information based on JAKIM Zones from the given state (Negeri) initial.

example.daerah: Kuala Kangsar, Sg. Siput , Ipoh, Batu Gajah, Kampar
Kg Gajah, Teluk Intan, Bagan Datuk, Seri Iskandar, Beruas, Parit, Lumut, Sitiawan, Pulau Pangkor
Selama, Taiping, Bagan Serai, Parit Buntar

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state (negeri) initial. Eg: `prk` for Perak, `sbh` for Sabah etc.).

get.description: Return the zone information for the given coordinates.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude coordinate.

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: The longitude coordinate.
